name: Swift N Drift - Free Drift Car game
name_original: Swift N Drift - Free Drift Car game
description:
Description
  • Swift N Drift is a simple casual game created with Construct 3.
  • Tap Right to turn clockwise or Left for anti clockwise.
  • Collect Coins, Diamonds and Stars to unlock cars.
  • Earn high score and rank first on Google Leaderboard.
  • Avoid other vehicles from colliding.
  • Watch out your car's Energy and life.
PLAY, COMMENT AND SHARE DOWNLOAD
